purpose: To provide developers with a set of reusable and accessible UI components for building AI-driven applications.
principle: Built using modern web technologies like React and TailwindCSS to ensure customizable and responsive design.
reusability: Offers a library of components that can be easily integrated into React applications, with support for customization through TailwindCSS.
limitations: As an alpha release, it may have limited documentation and potential instability in some components.
name: prompt-kit
description: Core building blocks for AI apps.  High-quality, accessible, and customizable components for AI interfaces.
highlight: High-quality, customizable UI components specifically designed for AI applications.
